item.title: [Paper Presentation] Canu: Scalable and Accurate Long-Read Assembly via Adaptive k-mer Weighting and Repeat Separation
item.description: Presented a state-of-art long-read assembly pipeline ‘Canu’, which builds upon many existing methods.
